body.title: CTIA Wireless 2008 - Las Vegas
body.p: I am not even entirely certain what this conference is about, but it is April 1-3 in Las Vegas, and I'm going to be there. If anyone else is also going to be there and would be interested in meeting me, please contact me.
While I'm there I intend to wander a little bit, and if I find anything particularly interesting (or anything iPhone related), I'll be adding it to this page.
